fields.description: The number of cylinders in the engine.
The year the car was released.
The name of the car: all unique values

card.description: A small dataset of different car statistics, originally from 1983, used to predict their MPG (miles per gallon).

context.potentialUses: Determine a car's MPG based on various features like weight and horsepower.
context.potentialMisuses: Since it's 30 years old, it may not reflect advancements in technology - don't buy your car based on this!
